DOC.brief_summary: This study additional component protocol 6005 , title Simplifying Menstrual Regulation ( MR ) : Exploring role at-home semi-quantitative pregnancy test follow-up menstrual regulation service provision Pakistan . The study seek pilot self-assessment checklist help woman , receive medical service incomplete abortion , correctly identify warn sign symptom determine whether return clinic . The checklist serve useful resource help timely identification woman need additional care help streamline service delivery . In addition , study provide important data role misoprostol vary level health service offer array treatment incomplete abortion .
DOC.brief_title: Simplifying Menstrual Regulation ( MR ) : Post Abortion Care Pakistan
DOC.criteria: Vaginal bleeding pregnancy Open cervical o . No sign severe infection , define least one following : 1 ) foul smell discharge , 2 ) fever > 38 degree C , 3 ) uterine tenderness No hemodynamic disturbance ( pulse > 110/min systolic bp < 100 ) Suspected ectopic pregnancy Unable provide inform consent
